acupoint.standard_location: 在面部，当眉头陷中，眶上切迹处
acupoint.standard_location_en: On the face, in the depression at the medial end of the eyebrow, at the supraorbital notch
acupoint.simple_method: 眉毛内侧端，眉头凹陷处
acupoint.simple_method_en: At the inner end of the eyebrow, in the small depression.
acupoint.anatomical: 有额肌及皱眉肌；有额动静脉；布有额神经内侧支
functions: 祛风明目 (dispel wind, brighten eyes)
清热止痛 (clear heat, relieve pain)
